content.question: Which of the following is the primary cause of stratospheric ozone depletion?

choices.label: Chlorine atoms in <math alttext="C F Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CFCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
Mercury released from the combustion of coal
<math alttext="P A N S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PANS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> from automobile exhaust

content.answer: Chlorine atoms in <math alttext="C F Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CFCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
